name: Congestion charges
description: Fees imposed on vehicles entering designated city areas to reduce traffic congestion.

name: Parking charges
description: Increased parking fees to discourage long-term car use and promote modal shift.

name: Restricted parking
description: Reductions in available public parking to limit car access, especially in central zones.

name: Limited traffic zone / Pedestrianisation of streets
description: Car-free or low-emission zones that prioritize pedestrians, cyclists, and shared mobility.

name: Parking supply management
description: Policies that reduce or restructure parking supply to manage demand and encourage alternatives.

name: Speed limits
description: Lowering vehicle speed limits to improve safety and promote non-motorized travel.

name: Mobility hubs (see task T3.2)
description: Centralized locations where multiple transport modes (e.g., bikes, buses, taxis) are integrated.

name: Scheduling integration in MaaS services (see task T2.3)
description: Coordinated schedules across transport services to streamline connections.

name: Ticketing integration in MaaS services (see task T3.4)
description: Unified or digital ticketing across services to simplify travel.

name: Improved NSM infrastructure, e.g. bike lanes & "park & ride"
description: New infrastructure like bike lanes, “park & ride” stations to support non-car travel.

name: On demand vehicle sharing action plan
description: Access to shared vehicles (cars, bikes, e-scooters) on demand via apps or stations.

name: Nudging (gamification or rewards)
description: Use of rewards or games to encourage use of shared or sustainable transport.

name: Dynamic pricing of NSM
description: Flexible pricing (e.g., cheaper off-peak rides) to balance demand and promote use.

name: Improved information about the availability of shared modes
description: Real-time data on vehicle availability and travel options via digital platforms.

name: Introduction of new NSM services (ex. bike-sharing)
description: Launch of bike-sharing, scooter-sharing, or other new transport options.

name: Introduction of new PT infrastructures/lines (ex. e-buses, LRT)
description: Deployment of new public transport lines like electric buses or tram extensions.

name: Streets retrofitting/introduction of priority lanes
description: Street redesign for better walking/cycling and priority lanes for buses or shared modes.

name: Dedicated parking spaces for carsharing/micromobility
description: Reserved spaces to support the use of shared cars or micromobility vehicles.

name: Widening PT geographical area
description: Extending public transport coverage to reach underserved zones.

name: Central PT planning and construction program
description: Comprehensive public transport network planning to enhance coordination and efficiency.
